title: Ari Shaffir
itunes:title: Ari Shaffir
description:
Comedian, actor, podcaster, writer, and producer Ari Shaffir joins Whitney to dissect the entire landscape of modern comedy while also making a convincing case for party drugs and long vacations. Check out his brand new special “Jew” on his YouTube channel available now, for free!

🙂 SPONSORS 🙃

Manscaped - https://manscaped.com : promo code WHITNEY

🐘DON’T RIDE ELEPHANTS! ❤
